demos.title: NCR Data
demos.body: Non-Conformance Report (NCR) data detailing inspection stages, equipment issues, root causes, corrective actions, and resolution statuses.
questions: What is the total number of NCRs (Non-Conformance Reports) recorded in the dataset?
How many NCRs are currently open versus closed?
What are the most common problem categories identified in the NCRs?
What is the average time taken to close an NCR from the open date to the close date?
Which equipment has the highest number of NCRs associated with it?
